Posts.Content: Hello Now only review magnetic resonance have commanded. The scanner of bones was before operation in the month of May. Then it seemed that there was no metastasis. I hope that in a week we know something more clear. Now only that psa is high. He is in general well, still working everyday and is in a good mood. He is a very cheerful person and it is an example as he carries the cancer. Thank you all for answering. Every day I seek and find more information about this disease. There is not much information in Spanish, but I am already learning other languages and that helps a lot. Gracias
Posts.Title: Prostate cancer t3b gleason 9

Posts.Content: Hola, My husband has prostate cancer. June 2013 open radical prostatectomy. Stage t3b with gleason 9. PSA before operation 36. After operation. 0.25. 0.56 in October 0.78 psa. November begins with radiotherapy of rescue. December suspended radiotherapy to operate of urethral stricture. 2 weeks after radiotherapy continues until January. on March 18 the first control... They say that the psa is high. We are waiting for other results and also control of colonoscopy as he had colon cancer 10 years ago. I'm very worried and waiting makes me very nervous. Still do not know what type of treatment has to continue and if there are metastases in bone. If there is someone who has been in the same situation, what type of treatment received? Sorry my English, I'm writing with the help of tradukka since I live in Spain and do not speak English well. Saludos
Posts.Title: Prostate cancer t3b gleason 9
